actions.committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Received in the Senate and read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

actions.in_committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Public Lands and Reserved Water.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Public Lands, Reserved Water and Resource Conservation

official_title: A bill to permit the removal of certain material from the Mount Rushmore National Memorial.

summary.text: Permits the children of a named individual, in recognition of their father's contributions to the Mt. Rushmore National Memorial, to remove a stone from an appropriate area of such Memorial for use as his tombstone.

titles.title: A bill to permit the removal of certain material from the Mount Rushmore National Memorial.
